basics.name: Jie Wang
basics.label: Ph.D. Candidate in Computing Science
basics.summary: Ph.D. candidate at the University of Glasgow, supervised by Prof. Joemon M. Jose. My research focuses on AI Agent & Large Language Models, with expertise in Reinforcement Learning, Personalization, and Multi-modal Recommendation & Information Retrieval. I have published 14+ papers in top-tier venues including SIGIR, CIKM, WSDM, TKDE, and ECIR.

work.name: Amazon
work.summary: Applied Scientist Intern working on recommendation systems and machine learning applications.

work.name: University of Glasgow
work.summary: Teaching assistant for multiple computing science courses at undergraduate and postgraduate levels.

work.name: Tencent
work.summary: Research intern working on recommendation systems and machine learning algorithms.

education.summary: Supervisor: Prof. Joemon M. Jose. Research focus on AI Agent & LLMs, Reinforcement Learning, Personalization, Multi-modal Recommendation & Information Retrieval.
